scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --audit-level=moderate && cd backend && npm audit --audit-level=moderate && cd ../frontend && npm audit --audit-level=moderate
scripts.pre-push: npm run quality:check && npm run security:audit
scripts.validate: npm run install:all && npm run build && npm run quality:check
